    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Poison Fizz](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1926)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Lozenge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=484" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 50 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Made from a special mixture of honey and alchemical reagents, poison fizz is a zesty, sweet rock candy that pops and crackles in your mouth. For 1 hour, you have an item bonus to saving throws against [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) and being [petrified](/Conditions.aspx?ID=30).

 **Secondary Effect** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Effect** You bite the poison fizz to release its poisonous liquid center and spray green mist in a 15-foot cone. This deals poison damage with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save. A creature that critically fails is also [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) until the end of your next turn and is then temporarily immune to being blinded by poison fizz for 1 hour.
